system.description:
You value your privacy, and do not appreciate those who insert themselves in your affairs. Choose one of the following options:

Get Out: You know the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-maneuvers.Item.cbrxwsl8gteto6gg]{Imposing Glare} maneuver, and may activate it once per short or long rest without spending exertion.

Slip Away: You are proficient in Stealth.

Watery Veil: You know the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.i4ejucvglhqpfm57]{Fog Cloud} spell, and may cast it once per long rest without a spell slot.
